scaredy cat.name: Scaredy Cat
scaredy cat.desc: When enemies initiate a fight with you, gain a speed boost.

conditioned runner.name: Conditioned Runner
conditioned runner.desc: You regenerate health faster than normal when sprinting below 75% HP. The health amount scales with your agility stat.

endurance runner.name: Endurance Runner
endurance runner.desc: Even when things look dire, you still have it in you to keep your legs moving.
